snippet: Shares of Ryanair tumbled nearly 13 percent after the airline slashed its earnings forecast as economic weakness and intensifying competition drove ticket prices down.
abstract: Shares of Ryanair tumble nearly 13 percent after the European budget airline slashed its earnings forecast as economic weakness and intensifying competition drove ticket prices down; airline says profit for fiscal year could fall to 500 million euros from earlier estimate of 570 million euros.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Ryanair tumbled nearly 13 percent after the airline slashed its earnings forecast as economic weakness and intensifying competition drove ticket prices down.

headline.main: Ryanair Cuts Its Annual Outlook for the Second Time in Two Months
headline.print_headline: Ryanair Cuts Its Annual Outlook For the Second Time in Two Months
